about_the_game:
MedCom Origin is a story about russian city in which the pathogen outbreak occurred. Once flourishing being a showcase of the achievements of the country now this place has broken into an abscess. PMCs shoot people right on the streets of the city, parks and squares are turned into warehouses for corpses.

Welcome to the city, welcome to the hell.

Features :
- Session FPS PVP Shooter
- Play as federal soldier or pmc contractor
- TeamPlay
- Storyline about city that became a death trap

First Chapter include:
- Player Hub
- 1 Team Deathmatch mission
- Starter weapon pack :
- 2 automatic rifle
- 1 PDW

content_descriptors.notes: the game will feature scenes of harshness and violence

name: MedCom Origin Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700 CPU @ 2.90GHz 2.90 GHz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 Super
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600Х
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
